subject: Throttle pedal malfunction
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I am reaching out to report another issue with my throttle. I was sent a replacement for a broken part on my first throttle pedal. I installed the new one and it was running good for a while. But for the last few weeks now, the throttle has been sticking. It’s not the actual pedal but the sensor that sticks every so often. It’ll happen in the middle of a race and when I release the throttle pedal, the sensor maintains 100% throttle for 2-3 seconds before cutting off. It’s very frustrating as it has ruined several races now. Are there any know fixes to this issue? I’ve inspected the pedal and didn’t find any physical malfunctions. 

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Michaelaliffi,    In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.

I've completed these steps, and the throttle pedal is still not responding.
Nothing happens when trying to calibrate and the same issue is still
occurring.

On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 7:41 PM support@simsonn.com

I’ve got the thrills pedal working now. But it has a ton of travel. Not physical, but the sensor doesn’t pick up any throttle until the pedal is fully depressed. I’ve tried recalibrating the pedal with no success. Any advice on how to remedy this issue?
Hi Michaelaliffi,  Please click the “offset” function at the top right corner of the SIMSONN MANAGER software to reset the pedals to zero.

are the offset values that I receive.

      主题: Fwd: Simsonn pro x ultra troubleshoot  
      描述:       
  ﻿  
 
 Hi Simsonn, 
 
 
 
 
I’m experiencing a serious issue with my Pro X Ultra pedals. The throttle signal flickers/jumps erratically in DIView, Windows, and iRacing — even when the throttle pedal cable is completely unplugged.
 
 
 
 
 
What I’ve tested:
 
 
 
 
 
 
Different USB ports
 
 
Swapped cables between the brake and throttle
 
 
Confirmed brake works fine
 
 
Tried calibration and firmware software
 
 
Throttle input flickers in DIView even with no cable connected
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
There’s no visible serial number on the unit, and it doesn’t show in the Simsonn software. 
 
 Order number: SSN1791 
 Date of purchase: 06-18-2025 (june 18th) 
 Purchased through simsonn website. 
   
 Attached is a video of what the USB controller is showing, both with and without pedals plugged in. 
   
 
Thanks,
 
 
Michael Aliffi

Hi Michaelaliffi,     Please try the following steps:    Go to Settings → Update and update to the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2;    After the update, restart the software, then update your pedal firmware;    Confirm that the firmware versions are CPU1: 2.0.5 / CPU2: 2.0.4;    Test again to see if the issue persists.    If the problem remains, we can send you a new throttle sensor for replacement.        https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
